Title: Playground Heroes
Plot: Milli, Geo and Bot reward themselves for cleaning up Umi Headquarters with a trip to the playground. But just as they?re getting ready to leave, they get a call on the Umi Alarm from their friend Mia. A storm has left the sandbox, swings, slide, and bouncy bridge in disarray and until everything gets fixed, the park will remain closed.
